Now we'll focus on more practical applications of Intimidation. Traning dummies make good targets, but they don't hit back. The golems at the edge of this terrace, however, generate attacks for you to block. Axe Block, that is.

While using Intimidation, a successful Axe Block allows you to use Axe Counter. Not only will you deliver a strong attack in response, but while doing so your resistance to knockdown and stagger increases, and any incoming damage is reduced by 50%.

Well? What are you waiting for?

Excellent work. Timing is everything in combat. Intimidation also increases the amount of damage you can stop with an Axe Block, as well as extending its protective effects to allies behind you.

You've learned all you need to know from me, the rest is in your hands!
